visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall'. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis represents the months of the year, and the y-axis represents the rainfall in millimeters. The data series is named 'Rainfall' and includes monthly rainfall data. Custom colors are applied to the series, and additional configurations include settings for the chart's background color, margins, and legend alignment. The legend is enabled and styled with a specific font size and color.
